description: Non-existent in Kurumada`s original manga, Heavenly Savage Star, Bennu Kagaho is one of the newly introduced Specters of Hades. Kagaho shows loneliness, sadism and rage in battle and determination. He has a rivalry with Libra Dohko, and memories of his dead younger brother Sui, who committed suicide because he felt he was a burden for Kagaho, who always ended up injured when protecting him.
name: Tenbousei Bennu no Kagaho
